Speaker

Meet our speakers and hosts for the Open House

Meet our speakers

Get to know the inspiring speakers and hosts leading our Open House sessions.
Each expert brings a wealth of knowledge and experience from their respective fields

Dr. Sarah Latham

An experienced career advisor and professor specializing in AI and Data Science. With over 15 years of experience in both academia and industry, she has guided numerous students into successful tech careers. Her research focuses on the application of artificial intelligence in healthcare and ethical considerations in technology development.

James Arther

A software engineer and coding educator with a passion for empowering beginners to embrace the world of programming. He has worked at leading tech companies, contributing to cutting-edge projects in automation and cloud computing. James is known for his engaging teaching style and practical approach to coding.

Emily Carter

Emily Carter is a UX/UI designer with a background in creative arts and digital design. She currently works at a top design agency, crafting user experiences for global brands. Emily is passionate about blending creativity with technology to create impactful digital products that connect with users on a deeper level.

Alex Rodriguez

Alex Rodriguez is a renowned public speaking coach and communication expert with over 12 years of experience in helping professionals and students master the art of presenting. He has worked with leaders across industries, training them in effective communication strategies and building confidence for speaking in public. Known for his dynamic workshops, Alex specializes in teaching techniques for overcoming stage fright, structuring impactful presentations, and engaging diverse audiences.

Dr. Karen Williams

Dr. Karen Williams is a seasoned clinical psychologist with expertise in student mental health and well-being. She has over a decade of experience in counseling and mental health education, helping students develop resilience and cope with the stresses of university life. Her focus is on creating supportive environments that promote mental wellness and academic success.

Anthony Miller

A business strategist and entrepreneurship expert, with extensive experience in helping startups navigate challenges and scale successfully. As a professor of business and innovation, he teaches students the critical skills needed to thrive in the modern business world. Dr. Miller has advised numerous companies and authored books on leadership, strategy, and business development. His seminars are known for blending practical business insights.

Emma Pierce

A prominent actress and drama coach with a career spanning stage and film. She has worked in numerous theater productions and film projects, gaining deep expertise in character development and performance techniques. Emma now dedicates her time to coaching aspiring actors, helping them refine their skills in building compelling characters for both stage and screen. Her workshops are highly interactive, focusing on emotional depth, storytelling, and mastering the craft of acting.
